header.gameNote: SOUTH PADRE ISLAND INVITATIONAL AT SOUTH PADRE ISLAND TX

article.headline: N. Colorado 74, W. Carolina 57
article.story: SOUTH PADRE ISLAND, Texas -- Connor Osborne scored 16 points to lead Northern Colorado to a 74-57 win over Western Carolina Friday at the South Padre Invitational. Mike Proctor and Tate Unruh scored 10 points each for the Bears (1-4), who led 26-16 at halftime and shot 47 percent from the field for the game. Northern Colorado overcame a 35-point effort by Brandon Boggs of the Catamounts (2-4). Boggs was 12 for 23 from the field -- 5 for 8 from 3-point range -- and went 6 for 7 from the free-throw line. No other Western Carolina players were in double figures as the rest of the team shot 21 percent from the field (8 of 29). Overall the Catamounts shot 32 percent.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
